sentences.en: A similar piece of material, worn by incontinent adults.
sentences.cn: 成人尿布''.'失禁'. ''成年人穿着的类似物品.

sentences.en: He was in any event severely crippled, even for a time paralysed and incontinent.
sentences.cn: 不论如何,罗斯福落下了严重残疾, 甚至一度麻痹瘫痪,完全失禁.

sentences.en: His diseased bladder left him incontinent.
sentences.cn: 他患病的膀胱使得他小便失禁。

sentences.en: People often become incontinent when they get very old.
sentences.cn: 人老了就往往有内急失禁现象.

sentences.en: The underground water was exhausted by incontinent use.
sentences.cn: 翻译地下水由于无节制的使用而枯竭了.

words.tran_cn: [医] 失禁；无节制；不能自制
失禁的；不能自制的，无节制的；荒淫的

trans.tran_en: unable to control the passing of liquid or solid waste from your body
